title: [Bath House, Foyer]
description: Red cedar planks alternate with teak to create a striped floor that stretches through twin arches that lead to the southeast and southwest.  Cobalt blue walls rise to the peaked ceiling, where stained glass windows filter the sunlight and cast prismatic whorls across the room.  Framed in bamboo, a large sign is the focal point of the foyer.

paths: Obvious exits: southeast, south, southwest, out
